citation.abstract: to evaluate the effects of curcumin on total cholesterol, LDL cholesterol, HDL cholesterol, and triglyceride in acute coronary syndrome patients.
citation.title: The effect of curcumin on lipid level in patients with acute coronary syndrome.

blogs.title: Turmeric Compound Boosts Regeneration of Brain Stem Cells
blogs.summary: Turmeric, and its active ingredient, curcumin, is one of nature's wonderful gifts. Not only is it the foundation for most curries (yum!), but it is also turning out to have impressive and far reaching health benefits, including:Acts as an anti-inflammatory

news.title: Why is everyone raving about turmeric?
news.summary: Hi Rebecca, great question! Turmeric has been used as a medicine, spice and colouring agent for thousands of years.

news.title: You Should Probably Be Eating More Turmeric. Here’s How
news.summary: Turmeric is quickly becoming an “it” superfood. You’ve probably seen the ingredient all over Pinterest and Instagram in the form of golden-hues lattes, soups, and vegan ice cream.

facebook.title: Timeline Photos
facebook.summary:
Los beneficios de la cúrcuma son ampliamente conocidos en la Medicina Ayurveda y en la gastronomía de la India: 

- Ayuda a tratar la depresión
- Aumenta la capacidad antioxidante del organismo
- Mejora la función cerebral
- Reduce el riesgo de ataques car

facebook.title: Timeline Photos
facebook.summary:
CURCUMINE EN EEN HOOG CHOLESTEROL GEHALTE.
